statement: A basic NotionReader class can be initialized in src/tools/notion_reader.py by fetching the Notion API token using utils.secrets_manager.get_secret('NOTION_API_TOKEN') and passing it to the notion_client.Client constructor.
The notion_client.blocks.children.list method should be used to retrieve all blocks for a given page ID, returning a list of Notion block objects.
judgement: Mental analysis confirmed this aligns with notion-client documentation for fetching page content blocks. Looks like the correct approach.
